sourcesContent: import{jsx as e}from"react/jsx-runtime";import s from"react";import{useMessage as o,handleMessageAction as n}from"@aws-amplify/ui-react-core";import{ThemeProvider as r}from"../../ThemeProvider/index.js";import{BannerMessage as a}from"../BannerMessage/BannerMessage.js";import{FullScreenMessage as t}from"../FullScreenMessage/FullScreenMessage.js";import{ModalMessage as i}from"../ModalMessage/ModalMessage.js";import c from"./handleMessageLinkAction.js";function l(e){return null}const m={BannerMessage:a,CarouselMessage:l,FullScreenMessage:t,ModalMessage:i},M=({action:e,url:s})=>{n({action:e,url:s,handleMessageLinkAction:c})};function g({components:n}){const a=s.useMemo((()=>Object.assign(Object.assign({},m),n)),[n]),{Component:t,props:i}=o({components:a,onMessageAction:M});return e(r,Object.assign({colorMode:"light"},{children:e(t,Object.assign({},i))}))}g.BannerMessage=a,g.CarouselMessage=l,g.FullScreenMessage=t,g.ModalMessage=i;export{g as default};
